Name: Clorinde
Title: Candlebearer, Shadowhunter
Description: An undefeated Champion Duelist. Sword in hand, she defends justice in the Court of Fontaine.
Description.zh_CN: 不败的决斗代理人。以手中的剑维护着枫丹廷的「公义」。
Skill Ascension Materials: Teachings of JusticeGuide to JusticePhilosophies of JusticeEveramberCrown of Insight
